title: Integrative development of smart drug-vector nanostructures for adaptive delivery to target cells
description: Led a €22K Marie Curie research project on smart drug delivery systems. Developed innovative nanostructures for targeted drug delivery with adaptive properties for enhanced therapeutic efficacy.

title: Synthesis, biological evaluation and in Silico modeling studies of N-Alkylated hetero-cyclic compounds
description: PhD research project focusing on multi-target drug candidates. Synthesized 30+ novel compounds and published 17 research papers in top journals. Awarded Doctoriales Innovation Prize.

title: Diphosphines amino acids derivatives: Synthesis, Catalysis and bio-organometallic
description: Research internship focusing on organometallic chemistry and catalysis. Developed novel diphosphine derivatives with potential applications in pharmaceutical synthesis.

title: Analysis of aflatoxins in food samples
description: Analytical chemistry internship focused on food safety and toxicology. Developed methods for detecting and quantifying aflatoxins in food samples using advanced chromatography techniques.

title: Synthesis and corrosion inhibition of pyrazole ligands (N-C-N) studied by GAUSSIAN 09W
description: Research project combining experimental synthesis with computational chemistry. Studied pyrazole-based corrosion inhibitors using quantum chemical calculations and experimental validation.

title: Drugs based on amino acids – design and synthesis
description: Undergraduate research project focusing on drug design principles and amino acid-based therapeutics. Explored the synthesis and characterization of novel drug candidates.

title: Hope Makers – Training & Mentorship Initiative
description: Social project focused on education and community development. Led training sessions and mentorship programs to empower youth and promote personal growth.

title: Arabic book: Breeze and Dust (نسيم وغبار)
description: Creative writing project resulting in a published Arabic book. Explored themes of personal growth, cultural identity, and human experience through storytelling.
